user_prompt: As a bank customer, I require a modern, user-friendly self-service portal that allows me to efficiently manage my banking needs without visiting physical branches. I need to securely log in using multi-factor authentication and access a personalized dashboard displaying available banking products and services based on my profile and eligibility. The portal must enable me to submit account opening requests and service modifications through streamlined workflows requiring minimal clicks. I expect to receive real-time status updates and email notifications regarding my submitted requests. The system should maintain a comprehensive history of all my interactions while ensuring my sensitive financial data remains secure. The portal must be responsive across various devices, providing a consistent experience whether I access it via desktop, tablet, or mobile phone. I should be able to save incomplete applications and return to them later, with the ability to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface. The solution must integrate seamlessly with the bank's existing core banking system while maintaining its own database to ensure optimal performance and reliability. Role-based access controls must be implemented to ensure I can only view and access services appropriate to my profile and authorization level.

epics.title: User Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement secure user login with multi-factor authentication and data protection mechanisms.
epics.description: Develop a robust authentication system that enables users to securely log in to the self-service banking portal using credentials and multi-factor authentication. Ensure encryption of user data in transit and at rest, compliance with banking security standards, and protection against common cybersecurity threats such as phishing and brute-force attacks. Establish secure session handling and automatic logout policies for inactive users.

epics.title: Personalized User Dashboard
epics.summary: Design and develop a personalized dashboard showing user-specific banking information and product recommendations.
epics.description: Create a dynamic dashboard interface that displays a summary of the user's accounts, available products, and personalized service recommendations based on eligibility and profile data. Include quick access widgets for recent activities, pending applications, and analytics such as balance summaries and spending trends. Ensure the layout is intuitive and adaptable to the user’s preferences.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
epics.summary: Implement workflows to handle new account openings and modification requests efficiently with minimal steps.
epics.description: Develop automated workflows allowing users to apply for account openings, service modifications, or product updates through guided and minimal-step forms. The system should validate data inputs, handle document uploads for verification, and ensure correct routing of requests to relevant backend systems. Focus on usability, clarity, and reducing manual intervention.

epics.title: Real-time Notifications and Request Tracking
epics.summary: Enable real-time tracking of submitted requests and send automatic notifications to users for status changes.
epics.description: Implement a notification and status tracking system that updates users in real-time about the progress of their requests and applications. Integrate email and in-portal notifications for milestones such as submission, approval, rejection, or additional document requests. Provide a history view of all transactions and service interactions for transparency and user convenience.

epics.title: Application Continuity and Document Management
epics.summary: Allow users to save incomplete applications and upload necessary documents within the portal.
epics.description: Develop functionality that enables users to save partially completed forms and resume them later from any device. Incorporate a secure document upload and management feature, supporting various file formats. Ensure validation, virus scanning, and secure storage of uploaded documents, maintaining compliance with data protection regulations.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s existing core banking systems for smooth data exchange.
epics.description: Establish seamless integration between the self-service portal and the bank’s core banking infrastructure through APIs or secure middleware. Ensure bidirectional synchronization for account details, application data, and transaction updates. Implement messaging and error-handling frameworks to ensure reliability and data consistency during integration processes.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
epics.summary: Implement role-based access control to ensure proper authorization and service visibility based on user profiles.
epics.description: Create a robust access management framework that defines and enforces role-based permissions. Ensure that users only access services and data relevant to their authorization level, maintaining compliance with internal policies and security regulations. Provide administrative tools for modifying roles and permissions dynamically.

epics.title: Responsive Design and Multi-Device Compatibility
epics.summary: Ensure the portal provides a consistent and responsive user experience across all device types.
epics.description: Develop a responsive user interface that adapts seamlessly to desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Implement modern front-end frameworks and responsive design patterns to provide a unified experience regardless of screen size. Optimize performance for faster load times and ensure accessibility and ease of use across platforms.

epics.title: Audit Logging and Data History
epics.summary: Implement comprehensive audit logs capturing all user actions and interactions for compliance and transparency.
epics.description: Create an audit logging mechanism that records every critical user interaction, system event, and request lifecycle. Provide interfaces for authorized users to view historical data of applications, modifications, and communication events. Ensure logs are securely stored and easily retrievable for compliance, debugging, and user transparency purposes.

user_stories.epic_title: Secure User Authentication and Multi-Factor Login
user_stories.title: Login with Credentials
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to log in using my username and password so that I can securely access my banking account.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Username and password must meet security standards. Password must be encrypted.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customer can log in using username and password.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer with valid credentials, when they log in, then they should be granted access.

user_stories.epic_title: Secure User Authentication and Multi-Factor Login
user_stories.title: Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) Setup
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to enable and verify multi-factor authentication using methods like OTP or biometrics so that my login remains secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: MFA methods include OTP (via SMS/Email) and biometric verification. Must be prompted after username/password login.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customer can set up and verify MFA. MFA must be prompted during subsequent logins.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a logged-in customer, when they set up MFA, then they should verify it successfully.

user_stories.epic_title: Secure User Authentication and Multi-Factor Login
user_stories.title: Session Timeout and Auto Logout
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want my session to automatically log out after inactivity so that my account stays secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Session timeout should be configurable. Default timeout is 15 minutes of inactivity.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customer session expires after configured period of inactivity.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer logged in, when they remain inactive for the timeout period, then they should be logged out automatically.

user_stories.title: Responsive Layout
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want the portal to adjust automatically to my device screen size so that I can access and perform actions easily whether on mobile or desktop.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Portal should adjust fluidly to various screen sizes. Maintain functionality and usability across devices.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Portal is fully functional and usable on mobile devices and desktops.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer accessing the portal, when they use a mobile device, then the portal layout should be responsive and user-friendly.

user_stories.title: Accessibility Features
user_stories.description: As a differently-abled customer, I want to use accessibility features like screen readers and high contrast so that I can navigate the portal easily.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement accessibility features such as ARIA landmarks, screen reader compatibility, high contrast mode.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Portal supports screen readers and high contrast mode.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a differently-abled customer, when they use a screen reader, then the portal should be navigable and understandable.

user_stories.title: Display Account Overview
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to view my active banking accounts, transactions, and balances from the dashboard so that I can monitor my finances conveniently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Show real-time account data. Include transactions, balances, and actionable alerts.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customer can view account overview on the dashboard.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a logged-in customer, when they access the dashboard, then they should see an overview of all active accounts.

user_stories.title: Show Personalized Recommendations
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to see banking products suitable for me based on my eligibility so that I can explore relevant services.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Recommendations based on customer profiles and eligibility. Display relevant products and services.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Dashboard shows product recommendations based on customer profile.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a logged-in customer, when they access the dashboard, then they should see personalized product recommendations.

user_stories.epic_title: Online Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Online Account Opening
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to open a new account online so that I can complete the process without visiting the branch.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The workflow should be user-friendly and require minimal inputs. Include step-by-step guidance.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customer can successfully open a new account online.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new customer, when they complete the online account opening process, then the account should be created without branch visit.

user_stories.epic_title: Online Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Submit Service Modification
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to request changes to my existing services or update details digitally so that I can manage them conveniently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Allow modifications to existing services. Include necessary validations and documents.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customer can submit service modification requests online.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a logged-in customer, when they request service modification, then the request should be processed digitally.

user_stories.title: Upload Supporting Documents
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to upload the documents required for account opening or service modification so that my requests can be processed efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Documents must be securely uploaded, scanned for malware, and validated for format.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customer can securely upload supporting documents.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a logged-in customer, when they upload documents, then the documents should be scanned and validated successfully.

user_stories.title: View Uploaded Documents
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to review and confirm uploaded documents so that I can ensure completeness and correctness.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Allow customer to view and confirm documents uploaded during process.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customer can view and confirm uploaded documents.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a logged-in customer, when they review their uploaded documents, then they should be able to confirm their completeness.

user_stories.title: Save Incomplete Application
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to save a partially completed application so that I can continue it later at my convenience.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Data must be securely stored and only accessible by the authenticated user.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customer can save partially completed applications.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a logged-in customer, when they save their application, then they should resume from where they left off.

user_stories.title: Resume Saved Applications
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to resume my saved application easily so that I don’t have to restart the entire process.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Allow customer to resume application from saved state.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customer can resume saved applications successfully.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a logged-in customer, when they resume their application, then they should continue from saved data without loss.

user_stories.title: View Request Status Updates
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to track the progress of my submitted requests in real time so that I’m aware of their current status.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Provide real-time status updates viewable in portal.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customer can view status updates in real-time.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a logged-in customer, when they check their request status, then it should reflect real-time progress.

user_stories.title: Email and Portal Notifications
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to receive email and in-portal notifications when there are updates to my request so that I stay informed.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Trigger notifications for key events like submission, approval, and rejection.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customer receives email and portal notifications for key events.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a submitted request, when the status changes, then the customer should receive email and portal notifications.

user_stories.epic_title: User Activity History and Audit Logs
user_stories.title: View Interaction and Request History
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to view a complete history of my submitted requests and activities so that I can reference previous interactions.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Maintain comprehensive history of customer interactions and requests.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customer can view their complete interaction history.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a logged-in customer, when they view their history, then it should show all previous interactions and requests.

user_stories.epic_title: User Activity History and Audit Logs
user_stories.title: Maintain Immutable Audit Logs
user_stories.description: As a compliance officer, I want all system actions to be securely logged so that audits and investigations can be conducted as needed.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Logs must be immutable, secure, and comprehensive for compliance and audits.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: All system actions are recorded in immutable logs.
user_stories.test_cases: Given any system action, when an audit is performed, then the logs should show an unaltered and complete record.

user_stories.title: Real-Time Data Sync with Core Banking
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want the portal to show updated and accurate banking data from the core system so that I can trust the information presented.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Synchronize data in real time between portal and core banking systems.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Portal shows real-time synchronized data from core banking.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer viewing their account, when data is updated in core banking, then the portal should reflect the changes instantly.

user_stories.title: Secure Core System Integration
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want the portal to communicate securely with core banking through APIs so that data integrity and system security are maintained.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure secure API communications between portal and core systems.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Portal securely communicates with core banking via APIs.
user_stories.test_cases: Given API integrations, when data is transmitted, then it should be secure and integrity should be maintained.

user_stories.epic_title: Independent Portal Database and Performance Optimization
user_stories.title: Independent Database Setup
user_stories.description: As a system architect, I want to set up a dedicated portal database that stores user data securely and ensures high portal performance.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Database should be performance-optimized, secure, and include backup/recovery.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Independent database is set up, secure, and optimized for performance.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the portal database, when it handles user data, then it should ensure security and high performance without reliance on core banking.

user_stories.title: Define and Assign Roles
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to define access levels for different user groups so that each role can only view or modify relevant data.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Roles must be configurable, with permissions explicitly defined.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Roles and access levels are defined and assignable to user groups.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an administrator, when they define roles, then different user groups should have appropriate access levels as per the role definition.

user_stories.title: Restrict Customer Access
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to only view features and information assigned to my profile so that my access remains appropriately limited.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Customer views and actions must be limited based on assigned role.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customer access is limited to relevant features and information.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when they access the portal, then their access should be restricted to features and data relevant to their role.
